description.value:
Fear, Psychic

Aura 5

Any enemy that starts its turn within the aura takes 20 psychic damage, and is slowed until the start of its next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Reach 3

+34 vs Fortitude; 4d8+7 necrotic damage. Miss: Half damage.

Encounter ✦ Charm, Psychic

Standard

Ranged 20

+34 vs Will; 2d10+8 psychic damage. In addition during the target's next turn, Kyuss determines what actions the creature takes and how the target uses those actions.

At-Will ✦ Cold, Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 20

+34 vs Reflex; 4d8+8 cold and necrotic damage, and the target is slowed and weakened (save ends both).

At-Will

Standard

Kyuss makes up to five attacks using corrupting touch and ray of cold death

Recharge 4-6 ✦ Fear, Gaze, Psychic

Minor, Recharge

Close burst 10

Targets one enemy; +34 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of Kyuss's next turn. If the target is in Kyuss's visions of worms aura, it also takes 2d10+5 psychic damage.

Daily ✦ Fear, Psychic

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +34 vs Will; 2d10+9 damage, and the target is stunned (save ends). Miss: Half damage, and the target is instead dazed (save ends).

Encounter

Minor

Kyuss recharges Kyuss's fearful hold or mind worm.
A humanoid killed by Kyuss rises as a wormspawn praetorian at the start of Kyuss's next turn.
By altering his shape, Kyuss can squeeze as if he were a Tiny creature.

Resist 15 necrotic, half damage from melee and ranged attack Vulnerable 10 radiant, 10 against close and area attacks Immune disease, poison 		Init +18 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 46Fort 46Ref 41Will 47
Speed 6

Cha 24 (+22)
Languages Common, Deep Speech
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +25, Dungeoneering +29, Religion +25Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 34 | Insight 34
